1. install aws cli for windows
2. On Command prompt type
   aws configure --profile devopsbuddy
   enter access key
   enter secret access key
   enter region - ap-south-1
   leave format default
 3. .aws folder will be created under USER_HOME, containing
    config
    credntials
 4. Check aws cli by executing following command on the prompt
    aws s3 ls --profile devopsbuddy
